title: The biosphere’s connected to the geosphere’s connected to the atmosphere
description: How have I not heard of silicate weathering before? I took two full courses on climate change in college. Also watched: I find it FASCINATING how the biosphere can influence changes to geology and climate, and these can even have an effect on astronomical phenomena — in this case through the creation of the ozone […]

title: Restoring habitat for axolotl
description: Somehow I never put together that axolotl is an Aztec word 🤦‍♀️ I’d like to think I would have guessed if I’d known they were from Mexico 😅 I knew that the conquistadors drained the big lake at Tenochtitlan, but I didn’t realize that some Aztec canals remain, and the islands they formed are still […]
